name: f_transaction__fa
description: This table records financial transactions, detailing both debit and credit sides, along with metadata about the transaction process.

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction

columns.name: debit_account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the account from which funds are debited

columns.name: debit_account_address
columns.description: Address associated with the debit account

columns.name: debit_gl_code
columns.description: General ledger code for the debit transaction

columns.name: debit_sbv_code
columns.description: Sub-balance code for the debit transaction

columns.name: debit_customer_id
columns.description: List of customer identifiers associated with the debit transaction

columns.name: debit_ccy_code
columns.description: Currency code for the debit transaction

columns.name: debit_trans_code
columns.description: Code representing the type of debit transaction

columns.name: debit_org_amount
columns.description: Original amount debited in the transaction's currency

columns.name: debit_lcy_amount
columns.description: Amount debited in local currency

columns.name: credit_account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the account to which funds are credited

columns.name: credit_account_address
columns.description: Address associated with the credit account

columns.name: credit_gl_code
columns.description: General ledger code for the credit transaction

columns.name: credit_sbv_code
columns.description: Sub-balance code for the credit transaction

columns.name: credit_customer_id
columns.description: List of customer identifiers associated with the credit transaction

columns.name: credit_ccy_code
columns.description: Currency code for the credit transaction

columns.name: credit_trans_code
columns.description: Code representing the type of credit transaction

columns.name: credit_org_amount
columns.description: Original amount credited in the transaction's currency

columns.name: credit_lcy_amount
columns.description: Amount credited in local currency

columns.name: other_sides
columns.description: Array of additional transaction details for complex transactions

columns.name: authorise_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was authorized

columns.name: authorizer
columns.description: Person or system that authorized the transaction

columns.name: accounting_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was recorded in accounting

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the transaction

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description or notes about the transaction

columns.name: channel
columns.description: Channel through which the transaction was conducted

columns.name: location
columns.description: Location where the transaction took place

columns.name: branch_code
columns.description: Code identifying the branch where the transaction occurred

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction record was created in the data lake house

columns.name: dlh_updated_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction record was last updated in the data lake house

columns.name: dlh_processed_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction record was processed in the data lake house

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: Source system from which the transaction record was ingested into the data lake house

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: Date used for partitioning the transaction record in the data lake house

columns.name: year
columns.description: Year when the transaction occurred

columns.name: month
columns.description: Month when the transaction occurred

columns.name: day
columns.description: Day when the transaction occurred
